TopicTitle: How do I complete a rescue contract?

Articles.Content:
So I just got into orbit to rescue Danfred Kerman, I'm right up next to him, but I can't take control of him to get him into my ship. Anyone else have this issue or know what I am doing wrong?

Thanks

Edited July 18, 2014 by cdgarren

Uh oh, I have this issue. Cant rescue Edbald Kerman.

I can confirm this isnt a user-specific issue.

Yep, I'm in the same rut. Went into the quicksave file, but he's listed properly as type=EVA, so I don't know what the problem is
Just to be sure, you are using the [ and ] keys to try switching and nothing is happening?

Press "[" or "]" to switch to near by object?

Edited July 18, 2014 by Sirine
Ninja
That's the issue: [ and ] only switches, Tracking Center cannot switch to the EVA pilot. Can't do it from orbit either.

Well, in this case. You will have to build a cage, cage him, and bring him back to Kerbin surface?

However, I don't think SQUAD will did this kind of stupid bug. I'm pretty confident that you can have the EVA Kerbal to enter your ship, somehow...maybe, get very very very near to him?

AND please confirm that you install 0 mod. If you are moded some how it affect the game play, thats your problem.

I have to clarify that the use of keys "[" and "]" to switch to the nearby object just work in us/english-like keyboards. It is not my case, for example. In my keyboard is the button right next to the zero button.

Try using the Klaw?

Edited July 19, 2014 by Curveball Anders

How close do you have to be in order to use the [ or ] key to switch to the Kerbal? I have no monopropellant on my rocket and the closest I can get is 10km.

Monopropellant is only "needed" for docking (some people dock with solid fuel ), rendezvous shouldn't be a problem. I also use a ship with no monoprop for rescue missions and don't have trouble getting within 300m of the EVA Kerbal, then I switch and bring him on board with his jetpack.

Perhaps this will help the new players for the time being:

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings

It says:

Cycle through active ships (forwards)

Not "Kerbals in proximity" or anything that would suggest that it will work.

At least - not from a perspective of a new player.

Just adding one more voice to say how unintuitive this is, if it weren't for this thread I don't think I'd ever have found out!

I get KSP is not really known for it's accessible controls but it's the first time I got this frustrated by not knowing what I'm doing wrong. Well, maybe since my first docking.

Just adding one more voice to say how unintuitive this is, if it weren't for this thread I don't think I'd ever have found out!

Same here.

I get KSP is not really known for it's accessible controls but it's the first time I got this frustrated by not knowing what I'm doing wrong. Well, maybe since my first docking.

Docking is more intuitive. The only thing I had to do for it is to find the RCS controls - everything else went fine (though it took few attempts).

IMHO the best way to fix it would be by adding right-click menu to Kerbals with "switch to" option (that's the first thing I looked for, but there was nothing) - alternative would be to add "grab" option while in EVA close to another Kerbal - it'll hold him and then, when you are close enough to the ship doors, it'd automatically put Kerbal in the capsule.
